Osmophobia is a fear, aversion, or psychological hypersensitivity to odors.The phobia generally occurs in chronic migraine sufferers who may have odor triggered migraines.Such migraines are most frequently triggered by foul odors, but the hypersensitivity may extend to all odors.

tweets.text: @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids The odour is getting worse and worse, night by night and has been since 2018. This is not your priority. It can‚Äôt be. If this if you working as hard as you can, then you are inept. This is out of control. #stopthestink

@philmackie @joe9tee @BBCr4today @BBCBreakfast @BBCNews @bbc5live Thank you SO SO SO SO MUCH. living with this night and day is a living hell. @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids must take immediate and emergency action. Thank you for telling our story.
